Item 1.Description: Deep fried English brie, soured grape chutney – griddled asparagus & crumbled Cheshire cheese – heirloom tomato salad & basil dressing – olives & roquito peppers – cracked black pepper potato skins – artisan bread & butter.

Item 2.Description: Prawn cocktail – tuna, mango & lime salsa – chip shop fish & mushy peas – oak smoked salmon – seared salmon fillet – artisan bread & butter.

Item 3.Description: Sliced cured meats – salami Milano – Serrano ham – wedge of the finest Cheshire cheese – house glazed ham – artisan breads

Item 4.Description: A true classic & we don’t mess with those here – romaine lettuce, parmesan & herb croutons – Caesar dressing – soft centred egg.

Item 5.Description: Studded with golden raisins, pomegranate & grapes – house leaves.
